rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Welcoming entry space with sufficient clearance for circulation; designed to align with auspicious directions per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious living area that includes a seating and dining arrangement; maintains balance in energy flow as suggested by Vastu.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen placed away from the main entrance to avoid negative influences. Ventilation and light are prioritized.

rooms.name: Triplex Studio Apartment
rooms.description: A multi-level studio apartment integrated into one area featuring a loft for sleeping quarters; designed with Vastu guidelines ensuring proper directional alignment.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space with quiet ambience and natural light to encourage concentration and learning, adhering to auspicious placement.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: An outdoor swimming pool area designed for relaxation; placed in the rear portion of the plot with privacy considerations and Vastu alignment.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Primary entrance door aligned to auspicious directions per Vastu, ensuring positive energy flow into the living space.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Large window in the living area for natural light and ventilation; positioned as recommended by Vastu.
